index: I play video games for fun. Personal info and Contact is below.
hinfo1: I first used a computer when I was a kid and I'm still using computers.
hinfo2: In 2016-2017, I started using Discord and made friends.
hinfo3: In 2018, I began creating Discord servers and making bots.
hinfo4: But I stopped making bots in 2020 because I got bored of JavaScript.
hinfo5: In 2022, I made a friend named Mr.Perfect and Ispeek. Then, I joined the CS:GO Turkey Server community.
hinfo6: In 2023, I started making models, and people loved them.
hinfo7: Right now, in 2024, I still play video games and help people.
